meanings.definition: The act of capturing sound or images on a storage medium.
meanings.sent1: I made a recording of my favorite song on a CD.
meanings.sent2: The recording of the concert was crystal clear.
meanings.sent3: The recording of the bird chirping sounded like a tiny orchestra.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a recording that played in his mind over and over.
meanings.sent5: The recording of the thunderstorm made me feel like I was right there.

meanings.definition: A document or account of past events.
meanings.sent1: The historical recording of the battle was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: She found an old recording of her grandparents' wedding.
meanings.sent3: The recording of the family reunion brought back so many memories.
meanings.sent4: His journal was a recording of his daily adventures.
meanings.sent5: The recording of the ancient civilization's downfall was a valuable find.

meanings.definition: The process of preserving data for future reference.
meanings.sent1: Data recording is essential for scientific research.
meanings.sent2: The recording of important documents ensures their safety.
meanings.sent3: The recording of the recipe was a lifesaver for the forgetful chef.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a recording device, storing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The recording of the meeting will be useful for reviewing the discussions.
